mapper.select: SELECT h.homework_id, h.homework_name, h.homework_desc, c.course_id, c.course_name, h.homework_file, h.submit_time, h.create_time, h.last_edit_time FROM homework h , course c WHERE h.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT h.homework_id, h.homework_name, h.homework_desc, c.course_id, c.course_name, h.homework_file, h.submit_time, h.create_time, h.last_edit_time FROM homework h , course c WHERE h.homework_id = #{homeworkId} AND h.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT h.homework_id, h.homework_name, h.homework_desc, c.course_id, c.course_name, h.homework_file, h.submit_time, h.create_time, h.last_edit_time FROM homework h , course c WHERE h.course_id = #{course.courseId} AND h.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT h.homework_id, h.homework_name, h.homework_desc, c.course_id, c.course_name, h.homework_file, h.submit_time, h.create_time, h.last_edit_time FROM homework h , course c WHERE c.teacher_id = #{course.teacher.teacherId} AND h.course_id = c.course_id

SELECT h.homework_id, h.homework_name, h.submit_time, h.create_time, c.course_id, c.course_name, t.teacher_id, t.teacher_name FROM student_course sc , homework h , course c , teacher t WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId} AND sc.course_id = c.course_id AND h.course_id = c.course_id AND c.teacher_id = t.teacher_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO homework (homework_id, homework_name, homework_desc, course_id, homework_file, submit_time, create_time) VALUES (#{homeworkId},#{homeworkName},#{homeworkDesc},#{course.courseId},#{homeworkFile},#{submitTime},#{createTime})
